- [93mHO[0m-[93m1[0m [93mmodulates[0m [93mobesity[0m-[93mrelated[0m [93mrenal[0m [93msodium[0m [93mmetabolism[0m [93mvia[0m [93moxidative[0m [93mstress[0m and [93mNa[0m/[93mK[0m-[93mATPase[0m [93msignaling[0m.: The [93mdysregulation[0m of [93mrenal[0m [93msodium[0m [93mmetabolism[0m [93mlinked[0m to [93mobesity[0m and [93mexcessive[0m [93mdietary[0m [93msalt[0m [93mintake[0m is a [93msignificant[0m [93mfactor[0m in the [93mdevelopment[0m of [93msalt[0m-[93msensitive[0m [93mhypertension[0m. [93mOur[0m [93mprevious[0m [93mresearch[0m [93mhas[0m [93mdemonstrated[0m that [93moxidative[0m [93mstress[0m-[93mparticularly[0m through the [93mamplification[0m [93mloop[0m of [93mreactive[0m [93moxygen[0m [93mspecies[0m ([93mROS[0m)-[93mplays[0m a [93mcritical[0m [93mrole[0m in [93mmodulating[0m [93mrenal[0m [93msodium[0m [93mhandling[0m [93mvia[0m [93mNa[0m/[93mK[0m-[93mATPase[0m [93msignaling[0m. This [93mpresent[0m [93mstudy[0m [93maims[0m to [93mdetermine[0m [93mwhether[0m the [93mantioxidant[0m [93menzyme[0m [93mheme[0m [93moxygenase[0m-[93m1[0m ([93mHO[0m-[93m1[0m) [93mmodulates[0m [93mrenal[0m [93msodium[0m [93mmetabolism[0m by [93maffecting[0m [93moxidative[0m [93mstress[0m and the [93mNa[0m/[93mK[0m-[93mATPase[0m [91mpathway[0m, [93mpotentially[0m [93mrevealing[0m [93mnovel[0m [93mtherapeutic[0m [93mavenues[0m. To [95minvestigate[0m this, [93mwe[0m [93mconducted[0m [93mhigh[0m-[93msalt[0m [93mdietary[0m [93minterventions[0m and [93madministered[0m [93mCo[0m([93mIII[0m) [93mprotoporphyrin[0m [93mIX[0m [93mchloride[0m ([93mCoPP[0m) in [93mboth[0m [93mnormal[0m and [93mobese[0m [93mC57BL[0m/[93m6J[0m [93mmice[0m. [93mResults[0m [93mindicated[0m that [93mobesity[0m [93mexacerbated[0m [93moxidative[0m [93mstress[0m and [93mdisrupted[0m [93msodium[0m [93mmetabolism[0m. [93mNotably[0m, the [93minduction[0m of [93mHO[0m-[93m1[0m [93mvia[0m [93mCoPP[0m [93meffectively[0m [93mreduced[0m [93moxidative[0m [93mstress[0m, [93msuppressed[0m [93minflammatory[0m [93mresponses[0m, and [93mmodulated[0m [93mmechanisms[0m of [93mrenal[0m [93msodium[0m [93mhandling[0m. These [93mobservations[0m were [93mcorroborated[0m by [93mdecreases[0m in [93mprotein[0m [93mcarbonylation[0m and [93mmalondialdehyde[0m ([93mMDA[0m) [93mlevels[0m, as [93mwell[0m as [93minhibition[0m of the [93mIL[0m-[93m6[0m/[93mSTAT3[0m [93minflammatory[0m [91mpathway[0m. [93mImportantly[0m, up-[93mregulation[0m of [93mHO[0m-[93m1[0m [93mcorresponded[0m with a [93mreduction[0m in [93mactivated[0m [93mNa[0m/[93mK[0m-[93mATPase[0m [93msignaling[0m, [93mlikely[0m [93mattributable[0m to [93mdiminished[0m [93mROS[0m [93mlevels[0m. [93mFurthermore[0m, [93mgenetic[0m [93manalyses[0m and [93murinary[0m [93mmetabolite[0m [93mprofiles[0m [95mvalidated[0m the [93mregulatory[0m [93meffects[0m of [93mCoPP[0m on [93moxidative[0m [93mstress[0m and [93msodium[0m [93mmetabolism[0m. This [93mresearch[0m [93munderscores[0m the [93mmultifaceted[0m [93mphysiological[0m [93mfunctions[0m of [93mHO[0m-[93m1[0m and its [93mcrucial[0m [93mrole[0m in [93mregulating[0m [93mrenal[0m [93msodium[0m [93mmetabolism[0m, with [93msignificant[0m [93mimplications[0m for [93mmanaging[0m [93msalt[0m-[93msensitive[0m [93mhypertension[0m.
- [93mSuper[0m-[93msulfated[0m [93mcement[0m [93mincorporating[0m [93mgold[0m [93mtailings[0m with [93mlithium[0m [93mslag[0m [93mmodification[0m: [93mHydration[0m [93mbehavior[0m and [93mheavy[0m [93mmetal[0m [93mimmobilization[0m.: The [93mincorporation[0m of [93mindustrial[0m [93msolid[0m [93mwastes[0m [93msuch[0m as [93mgold[0m [93mtailings[0m into [93mcementitious[0m [92msystems[0m [93mrepresents[0m a [93mviable[0m [93mstrategy[0m to [93mmitigate[0m [93mecological[0m [93mfootprints[0m and [93madvance[0m [93msustainable[0m [93mresource[0m [33mmanagement[0m. [93mHowever[0m, the [93mlow[0m [93mreactivity[0m of [93mgold[0m [93mtailings[0m and the [93massociated[0m [93mheavy[0m [93mmetals[0m [93mmay[0m [93mhinder[0m [93mhydration[0m and [93mcompromise[0m the [93mmechanical[0m and [93menvironmental[0m [93mperformance[0m of [93msuch[0m [92msystems[0m.
